title: Lingle man allegedly kills 4-month-old before shooting himself
content:
A 53-year-old Lingle man allegedly shot and killed a baby Thursday before turning the gun on himself, according to a press release from the Goshen County Sheriff's Office.
Dispatchers in Torrington received a call from Duane Clarkson Sylvester’s wife about 11:55 p.m., reporting her husband was suicidal. While on the phone, the woman told officials her husband shot her baby and then himself.
Goshen County deputies responded to the family’s home on the 8200 block of Cemetery Road. Emergency Services from Torrington and Lingle were also dispatched.
Sylvester was flown by AirLink to Regional West Hospital in Scottsbluff, Nebraska, where he is in the trauma intensive care unit. The 4-month-old infant died.
